verse: All this I have tested with wisdom and I said, “I determined to be wise”—but it was far from me.
Whatever it may be, it is far off and very profound—who can fathom it?
So I turned my heart to understand, to search and seek out wisdom and an explanation of things and to know the stupidity of wickedness and madness of folly.
“Look,” said Kohelet, “I have discovered this while adding one thing to another to find the scheme of things—
which my soul is still seeking, but not finding—I found one upright man among a thousand, but one upright woman among them all I have not found.
Only this have I discovered: God made mankind upright, but they went seeking after many schemes.”
